body.name: GRANITESTONE Armor Max 14 Inch Non Stick Frying Pans, Family Sized Non Stick Skillet, Large Frying Pan Nonstick Frying Pan, Induction Pan, Nonstick Pan for Cooking, Oven Safe Skillet, Dishwasher Safe
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 36 mins
features: GRANITESTONE ARMOR MAX: Each piece of Granitestone Armor Max cookware is built to last a lifetime while simultaneously providing the best nonstick experience ever produced by Granitestone. The heavy duty, forged, hard anodized exterior paired with a 4-layer nonstick interior ensures you have top of the market nonstick cookware for years to come.
BUILT TO LAST YEARS: Granitestone Armor Max is constructed from heavy duty, forged, hard anodized aluminum stronger than stainless steel, ensuring your nonstick cookware lasts for years on end.

NOTHING STICKS: Think healthier foods, easy food release, and effortless cleanups with Granitestone Armor Max- Each piece of cookware features a 4-layer ultra release nonstick coating designed to slide foods right off and durable enough to withstand any metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks and even electric beaters!

EASY TO CLEAN: Make cleanups quick and effortless with Granitestone Armor Max- The ultra nonstick 4 Layer coating is constructed to provide an effortless wipe down after use. Each piece of cookware is dishwasher safe allowing you to simply throw your cookware in the dishwasher for a 1,2,3 cleanup.

HEALTH AND SAFETY 1ST: Each Piece of cookware is made without PFOA, PFOS & other harmful chemicals including lead & cadmium, allowing you to Keep a healthy, toxin free, and ecofriendly cooking environment.

PROFESSIONAL GRADE HANDLES: Granitestone Armor Max’s stainless steel riveted stay cool handles are ergonomically designed for a safe, easy, and comfortable grip both righties and lefties can enjoy while cooking.

INDUCTION COMPATIBLE: Granitestone Armor Max is compatible with all types of stovetops- Induction, gas, electric, halogen, and ceramic – and is oven safe up to 500 Degrees, allowing you to cook virtually anywhere you’d like.

QUICK AND EVEN HEATING: Forged from a single sheet of hard anodized aluminum, each piece of cookware quickly and evenly conducts heat from end to end, ensuring there are no dead zones or hot spots and providing deliciously and perfectly cooked foods day in and day out.
10 YEAR GUARANTEE: Stand behind the protective shield of Granitestone Armor Max with the 10 year limited guarantee provided.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Ultra Nonstick Surface 2 Effortless Cleanups 3 Built To Last

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best nonstick pans I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: I taught cooking classes for many years so I can say with experience that these pans are amazing. The only thing you have to watch out for is keeping an eye on the heat levels, and when sauteing so something doesn't burn. They also wash perfectly in the dishwasher and you can finish cooking something in them in the oven with perfect results. I bought 4 of these in different sizes and gave all my other (very expensive) pans away! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality, great performance
reviews.reviewText: This pan is excellent for cooking family size meals. Whether making burgers, sautéing vegetables, heat stays in, and cooks the food quickly and evenly. Excellent product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great non stick
reviews.reviewText: We have had the pan for 3 months and my wife loves it. The non stick work's well and the size is able to handle large dishes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pan has been serving up dinners five nights a week since we bought it and it looks like new. I purchased this pan to replace a more expensive non-stick pan that started sticking about a year and a half after purchase. So far this pan has been going strong. We do not put this in the dishwasher or use harsh utensils/sponges on it so we are hopeful this will last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nonstick means NONSTICK!
reviews.reviewText: I"m a full blown Carnivore, so I cook in this pan daily. What's so great about GraniteStone? 4 months in and I haven't had a single thing stick that required more than hot water and a swipe with a paper towel. I use Plastic, Wood and Metal utensils when I use this pan and not a scratch to be found on the surface. I now own 2 each in the 10" and 12" size. I've even given some as gifts to friends that quickly become fans, inquiring where to get them.Try them... You'll thank me for the suggestion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's actually non stick!
reviews.reviewText: I love these pans! They are heavy duty and food does not stick to them as much as other pans I have owned. The label claims no oil is needed for cooking but I have not tried cooking without at least using oil spray. Also claims using metal utensils is permissible but I advise against it as I tried doing that and now my skillet has some slight scratches.Cleaning is very easy. My skillets are used daily and come clean with a little dish soap and a kitchen cloth. No scrubbing needed!So far I have bought 2 of these and plan to buy more. Fantastic product for the price point!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not suitable for induction stove
reviews.reviewText: This pan is non stick as described however it does not function very well on an induction cooktop. To get it to work at all you have to leave it on very high heat. The pan is not flat inside and is higher in the center, causing any liquid to run to the outer edges. Overall a very poor design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy but not too heavy
reviews.reviewText: Well I’ve not had this skillet very long but Have used it several times and I LOVE it!! Cast iron is getting to heavy for me as I age and I think this product can be used where I’ve always used cast iron! Am about to order another, smaller one!
